items.sentence: You have to get up early tomorrow. Why don\'t you go to bed?
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to admit it was his fault.
Let\'s not argue about that now. We\'ve got bigger problems.
The next song I\'m going to sing was written by Tom Jackson.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French.
I can\'t count the number of times I\'ve heard Tom say that.
Tom couldn\'t understand why no one else seemed to be happy.
Clearly, both drivers weren\'t paying attention to the road.
Tom and I used to hang out together when we were in college.
Tom and Mary agreed not to talk to their children in French.
Tom and Mary are sitting on the porch talking to each other.
There are a lot of things I need to do before I can go home.
There are lots of things we could do to help those families.
Tom ended up not buying the car he was looking at last week.
Tom finally convinced Mary to bake a birthday cake for John.
Tom gave Mary a calendar and she put it on her refrigerator.
Tom fell asleep while he was driving and caused an accident.
Tom found what he was looking for in the back of the closet.
Tom frequently waits until the last minute to pay his bills.
Why does this kind of thing always happen when I\'m on duty?
